title: Jump For Autism
text:
3:00 p.m. Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015 Categories 
Events, Fundraisers, Kids | Family Tuesday, Oct. 6, Sky High Sports, Charlotte will partner with the Charlotte Chapter of Autism Speaks for an enhanced Special Needs Day. From 3-6 p.m., proceeds raised will be given to the local chapter to support the Autism Speaks mission: to change the future for all who struggle with an autism spectrum disorder through research, awareness, and hope. Plus, the first 20 guests after 3 p.m. will receive free Sky High Swag! Related
